title: Covid-19: Ramaphosa cancels planned address to nation tonight
meta_description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has cancelled his scheduled address to the nation on Sunday night because the national command council on Covid-19 meeting he is chairing is dealing with "weighty issues" and likely to go on until late.

og.title: Covid-19: Ramaphosa cancels planned address to nation tonight
og.description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has cancelled his scheduled address to the nation on Sunday night because the national command council on Covid-19 meeting he is chairing is dealing with "weighty issues" and likely to go on until late.
